meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by a strong desire to achieve something high or great.
meanings.sent1: Her aspirational goal was to become a doctor and help people in need.
meanings.sent2: Many people have aspirational dreams of owning their own business one day.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his aspirational attempts at cooking always ended in disaster.
meanings.sent4: The mountain peak stood as an aspirational symbol of their journey ahead.
meanings.sent5: The aspirational vision of a better future inspired them to work harder.

meanings.definition: A strong desire to achieve something high or great.
meanings.sent1: His aspirational for success drove him to work long hours every day.
meanings.sent2: Having an aspirational can motivate you to push yourself beyond your limits.
meanings.sent3: The cat's aspirational for catching the laser pointer entertained the whole family.
meanings.sent4: The marathon finish line represented the ultimate aspirational for the runners.
meanings.sent5: The young artist's aspirational to create a masterpiece was evident in every brushstroke.
